Title: Relates to the repayment by a school district of a penalty arising from the late filing of a final cost report for an approved capital construction project
Summary: Relates to the repayment by a school district of a penalty arising from the late filing of a final cost report for an approved capital construction project.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the repayment by a school district of a penalty arising from the late filing of a final cost report for an approved capital construction project
